title: pond_water_level_under_resource_constraints
summary: Observed water level in earthen pond; volume not measurable.
description: Image documents the water level inside a single earthen pond used for farm operations. Water volume cannot be determined due to limited resources and lack of measuring instruments. The pond is self-managed and is the only water source for the farm. No public utility access is available.

external_reference.note: External image reference for independent verification.
